description: '''William Ezechukwu Onyeabor''' {{IPAc-en||audio=Ig-William Ezechukwu Onyeabor.ogg}} ({{IPAc-en|ɒ|n|ˈ|j|ɑː|b|ɔː|}}, {{respell|on|YAH|baw}}; 26 March 1946 – 16 January 2017) was a Nigerian [[funk]] musician and businessman. His music was widely heard in Nigeria in the late 1970s and early 1980s. Despite his success, he remained an enigmatic, private, and reclusive figure.
